Yes, the template is freely usable. Simply replace all placeholder content with your own data.
JSON-LD structured data, Schema.org markup, semantic HTML5, Dark/Light Mode, Zero JavaScript, WCAG 2.1 compliant, plain-text mirrors for LLM tools.

mainEntity.name: Where can I find the structured data?

acceptedAnswer.text: In the HTML head (JSON-LD) and in the /ai/ directory as JSON and TXT files for machine readability.

mainEntity.name: Do I need to keep the dual-layer architecture?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, for AI readability. The HTML serves humans, while JSON/TXT files serve AI agents and LLMs.
